s9.message: Fixed: List of recently reported issues has horizontal scrolling with some themes (forum topic).

s8.message: Fixed: Links in About dialog open in an external application on Linux (bug {1}).

s3.message:
Issue reporter: Page referrer is being sent to allow recognizing/investigating pop-up issues
    more easily.

s2.message: Persian translation added again, some other translations updated.

s1.message: The following lists the changes compared to Adblock Plus 1.3.1.

s10.message: Fixed: Toolbar icon is broken in SeaMonkey Mail nightly builds.

s7.message: Fixed: Hit counts might not get saved when the browser is closed (Firefox 4 only).

s6.message: Fixed: Toolbar icon's text shows up to the right of the icon rather than below it (forum topic).

s5.message: Fixed: Element hiding rules stop working after they have been subject to an exception (bug {1}).

s4.message:
Issue reporter: Sending a report is no longer possible in some scenarios (prevents useless
    reports).

s13.message: Fixed: Adblock Plus is confusing memory leak detection tools, a bogus leak is being reported.

s12.message: Fixed: "Invalid XBL binding" warning in Firefox 4.

s11.message: Fixed: Dragging a filter in Preferences might cause "unresponsive script" warning.
